dcterms:creator: J. J. McAuley
C. Targett
Q. Shi
A. van den Hengel
dcterms:description: A collection of product metadata and customer reviews from Amazon, specifically focusing on the Electronics/Computers subcategory. The dataset includes product titles, descriptive texts, category information, prices, brands, and image features, with a total of 24,272 training documents and 100 manually annotated test documents.
dcterms:title: Amazon review dataset
